tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: ** ***** ** *** **** ***** ** ******  Since one of my friends recommeded her, therefore my husband and I visited her for my pregnancy routine checkup . She was so humble and patient enough to listen to all our queries and answered all of them with detailed explanation. This behaviour was not only seen at the first visit, but on all the visits we did. She helped me deliver a sweet and healthy baby girl. Thankyou so much Seema maam for giving us that comfort which every new parent needs.  We truly adore you and appreciate your knowledge and professionalism♥️ we highly recommend Seema mam for all the concerns/queries related to your pregnancy and delivery.
Doctor was very helpful and good to talk to. She listened and explained our query. The hospital was good and staff were friendly. I highly recommend the Doctor.

I consulted Dr seema for my pregnancy in the entire first trimester however in initial visits she didn't speak much or explain things as must be. Whenever questions were asked she was always very brief in answering.
Post my NT scan she prescribed iron and calcium tablets to me but did not mention the most vital technique of taking iron tablet with lime water before breakfast and calcium tablet atleast 3 hours later. Due to which for 1 month there was no iron absorption in my body or reaching my foetus. Highly unrecommended!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to this doctor on my 5th month of pregnancy because my earlier doc was transferred. So, i told her all my concerns and she was not bothered at all and she just told baby is fine you can come next month. Then i told her i am gaining so much of weight please suggest me what should i do and She didn’t answer my question too.. i had no other option but to continue with her. everytime i went to her and told her concerns, she never answered. On my 35th week She said “aap kabhi bhi aake admit ho jao” i asked why. I can wait till 39th week atleast and why csection? She said “aajkal kon karwata hai normal” these were her wordings. I was literally shocked. I tried to switch my doc but it was not in the rule book of hospital to do such thing. Now its my 37thweek going on. She said ki aap next week karwa lo delivery kabhi bhi. Then i discussed the date with my family and messaged her that is this date fine mam?, i need to get my covid test done please reply... is this ok mam?  Can i call you mam?  And she is not replying to my messages. I called her twice at different times..that too she is not bothered for their patients. * **** **** *** **** ** ** **** *** *** ****** **** **** *** **** ******* ** *** ***** ** *** **** ** ** *** ****** ******** *** *** **** ** **** ******** ****** ***** ** ** ***** *** ***** *******

I went to this hospital after taking appointment but I waited for 1.30 hrs for my turn in this pandemic situation also the doctor was not very friendly in answering back next , I had some issue which made me tensed I called up the doctor and asked her to just have a look on the test report for which I was worried but her response was ‘’ whenever I will get time only then she will look at my report “ whereas I was getting worried about my result also next when we need appointment for ultrasound as it was  only  week in which we could get ultrasound done the appointment was not available for next one week . 
My experience with the doctor and hospital is not good   .

I went for the HPV vaccine for my daughter. They made us pay INR 1300 for registration and 4000 for a single dose. They should stop charging more than the actual price of the vaccine *** *** *** **** ** * *****

Amazing doctor  , very friendly, . Good in nature
Clarify everything very properly . Very good doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is very informative doctor. The eay she explains things liked the most. I will recommend her to every women hoing for pregnancy planning.
My wife visited the doctor and she was more than satisfied With Dr Doctor. Very calm, composed and polite

We had an appointment at apollo cradle moti nagar at 945am for ultrasounscan, my wife got her turn at 1245pm and doctor will see at 1pm. All this under covid19 situation and my wife is 4months pregnant

review: She is very arrogant and did not considered my words . She refused to accept ultrasound report and didn’t go for urine pregnancy test . She sent me back and told me to do hcg test only and wasted my time and money . I would not recommend this doctor to anyone..she was so rude and didn’t bother other person time. I told her I am working and cannot come again *** *** ******* ** **** ** **** *** ********** ******** ****** ***** Pathetic experience with so much rude person .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,
review: I moved to Delhi when i was 4 months and started consulting Dr. Seema based on great recommendations. It was totally worth it. She has been helpful and supportive throughout my pregnancy. Never minded to answer the question twice. I will highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** ********** *** ***** So calm, so composed, always so so reassuring. Her patience and skills helped me in having a normal delivery.

I'm vry happy with Dr. Behaviour
I recommend every one to this Dr. For sure

review: Dr Seema has got very positive vibrations.. she puts things simplistically and explains the issue in hand very sensitively. She is extremely warm and helps ease out the patient. Will strongly recommend her.
